full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RTA MGRIN DBANG CHEN PHYOGS BCUR BZHUGS, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHOG 'DI NA YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHIN TU RNAMS NAS NYAM THAG PA LA, BYAMS PA'I SEMS KUN BLANGS TE THA SHAL SKYON PA'I YUL NA SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS GA-YANG 'GUGS LA SOGS PA GZHER BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'I, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA 'CHAGS PO, BDAG LA SGRIB PA'I MI 'BYUNG MDZOD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN DBUL DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DGA' BA'I ZHING DU SKYE BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG DANG 'GRO @006B PA KUN, ,DBUL 'PHONGS SDUG BSNGAL MA LUS SEL BAR SHOG , ,,)
